edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart

Class PPPieChart

  • Object
    • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart.PPChart
      • edu.stanford.cs.pptx.chart.PPPieChart

  • public class PPPieChart
extends PPChart
    This class defines a pie chart on a PowerPoint slide.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PPPieChart(PPSlide slide, double x, double y, double r)
      Creates a new pie chart centered at (x, y) with the specified radius.
      PPPieChart(PPSlide slide, double x, double y, double width, double height)
      Creates a new pie chart within the specified bounds.

    • Method Summary

      Adds an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array.

      Creates an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array.

      Creates an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array.

      Gets the starting angle for the pie chart.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PPPieChart

        public PPPieChart(PPSlide slide,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double r)
        Creates a new pie chart centered at (x, y) with the specified radius.
        Parameters:
        slide - The PPSlide object on which this chart appears
        x - The x coordinate of the center
        y - The y coordinate of the center
        r - The radius of the pie chart

      • PPPieChart

        public PPPieChart(PPSlide slide,
                  double x,
                  double y,
                  double width,
                  double height)
        Creates a new pie chart within the specified bounds.
        Parameters:
        slide - The PPSlide object on which this chart appears
        x - The left side of the bounding box
        y - The top side of the bounding box
        width - The width of the bounding box
        height - The height of the bounding box

    • Method Detail

      • setStartAngle

        public void setStartAngle(double start)
        Sets the starting angle for the pie chart.
        Parameters:
        start - The starting angle for the pie chart

      • getStartAngle

        public double getStartAngle()
        Gets the starting angle for the pie chart.
        Returns:
        The starting angle for the pie chart

      • addWedges

        public PPPie[] addWedges(double[] data)
        Adds an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array. The colors are chosen from a standard nine-color palette designed to offer good visual separation.
        Parameters:
        data - The array of data values
        Returns:
        An array of pie wedges for the chart

      • createWedges

        public PPPie[] createWedges(double[] data)
        Creates an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array. The colors are chosen from a standard nine-color palette designed to offer good visual separation.
        Parameters:
        data - The array of data values
        Returns:
        An array of pie wedges for the chart

      • addWedges

        public PPPie[] addWedges(double[] data,
                         Color[] colors)
        Adds an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array. The colors array is used to set the fill color of the wedges. The wedges are laid out counterclockwise starting at the angle set by the setStart method.
        Parameters:
        data - The array of data values
        colors - The array of colors
        Returns:
        An array of pie wedges for the chart

      • createWedges

        public PPPie[] createWedges(double[] data,
                            Color[] colors)
        Creates an array of wedges for the pie chart using the data values in the specified array. The colors array is used to set the fill color of the wedges. The wedges are laid out counterclockwise starting at the angle set by the setStart method.
        Parameters:
        data - The array of data values
        colors - The array of colors
        Returns:
        An array of pie wedges for the chart
